page.title: 18CLUBS IN CURY/GUNWALLOE AREA
page.content: There are no real clubs in the area though some 'club' activities do occur in village halls. There is a village hall in Cury where the Women's Institute hold their club meetings. There is also a village hall in the Gunwalloe/Berepper area where the Women's Institute hold their club activities. This latter hall is also used by the younger members of the community for a Youth Club. There is also an 'Old People's Club which makes use of this hall. Other clubs are available for use in surrounding areas, both in Holiday sites and adjacent villages and towns. i.e. Helston where there is the Lady Street Club and the Godolphin club. There are also British Legion Clubs in surrounding areas.
